explanation: Funds are required to support the Rapid Sustainment Office (RSO). Funds were appropriated as congressional adds in the FY 2020 Appropriations Bill in the Tech Transition Program budget line for RSO to conduct Advanced Repair and Qualification Processes activities. A new Program Element (PE), 0708051F, Rapid Sustainment Modernization, was established to manage the execution of this new office. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally appropriated. This is a congressional special interest item. This is a base budget requirement.

Funds are available because they were appropriated as FY 2020 congressional adds for the Rapid Sustainment Office (RSO) for Advanced Repair and Qualification Processes. A new PE for RSO was not established until after the FY 2020 President's Budget submission. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally appropriated. This is a congressional special interest item. This is base budget funding.

Funds are realigned within the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, 20/20: appropriation from SOCOM to DSCA for proper execution of the Gender Advisors Building Partnership Capacity Women's Programs. This is a congressional special interest item. This is base budget funding.
